Classic Cartoon Collection, Vol. 1: Pranks in the Pink
Episode.Overview: This prized collection of the first 27 theatrical shorts featuring the Pink Panther includes the brilliant, OscarÂ®-winning* The Pink Phink as well as the only two cartoons (Sink Pink, Pink Ice) in which the mischievous feline speaks! *1964: Animated Short Subject
Episode.Writer: Bob Kurtz, Jim Ryan, John W. Dunn, Michael O'Connor

Episode.Director: Arthur Davis, Gerry Chiniquy, Hawley Pratt
Episode.EpisodeName: Classic Cartoon Collection, Vol. 2: Adventures in the Pink
Episode.Overview: Scratch the itch with these 27 beloved animated shorts, which find your favorite cool cat clawing his way out of trouble as he joins the army, builds a motorcycle, flies a jet and even herds cattle out west!
Episode.Writer: Art Leonardi, Bob Ogle, Chuck Couch, Don Jurwich, Jim Ryan

Episode.Director: Art Leonardi, Ara Madzounian, Arthur Davis, Friz Freleng, Gerry Chiniquy
Episode.EpisodeName: Classic Cartoon Collection, Vol. 3: Frolics in the Pink
Episode.Overview: Get ready for more cat-astrophic adventures as the wily Pink Panther stows away on a ship, waits tables, evades a tax collector and hits the slopes in this delightful collection of 27 classic animated shorts!
Episode.Writer: Art Leonardi, Dale Hale, David Detiege, Irv Spector, Jack Miller

Episode.EpisodeName: From Page to Screen - "In The Pink"
From Page to Screen - "The Pink Blueprint"

Episode.Overview: The Pink Panther employs various strategies in an effort to get himself a big holiday dinner.
The Pink Panther tries his paw at various winter sports, getting ready for the Lake Placid Olympic Games.
The Pink Panther gets a job delivering singing telegrams just in time for Valentine's Day.

When seeing a new house to buy, the Pink Panther sees Pale-man-a depiction of Friz Freling-painting the house blue. Through several occasions, the Pink Panther eventually paints the house pink. The pale-man accidentally grows pink flower when burying cans of pink paint. After noticing this, the Pink Panther eventually buys the house since it matches him.
"The Pink Phink" won the 1964 Oscar for Best Short Subjects: Cartoons.
The Pink Panther is very tired and can't find a place to sleep.
The Pink Panther stays in a store after closing time and ensues trouble after testing all the equipment.
The Pink Panther sees a thief trying to break into a safe, so he tricks him.

The Pink Panther is searching for some place to stay on the chilly night. He sees an open window and goes in. There is a hunter there who becomes disturbed and comes to see what all the noise is. Pink Panther must hurry and hide before he is spotted.
A drunk man brings the Pink Panther to his home.
The Pink Panther becomes a secret spy (agent). With the ""help"" of a British-accented off-screen narrator, he finds himself in a wide diversity of weird episodes.
The Pink Panther stumbles upon a basement cellar with an electric tool. He lights somethings down there that are harmful.
The Pink Panther causes some diamond miners to go crazy.
The Pink Panther is in desperate need of rest but a mosquito is watching TV which is causing him to stay awake.
A troublemaking narrator puts two nice neighbors against each other. Their fighting leads to bigger problems.
The Pink Panther discovers a speaking weight machine that gives suprises, but you only can use it with money (coins).
The Pink Panther wants some rest by going to the beach but it is disturbed by some sea animals.
The Pink Panther finds a red cape and ""tangles"" with a bull.

The Pink Panther tries to earn money. So he advertises his new drink called ""Pink Punch."" There is a asterisk on his sign that has its own mind and starts changing everything that comes near him green.

The Pink Panther spray paints his newly purchased car pink. The car has its own mind so he tries to blow the fumes from the car into an elderly lady. What they don't know is that the lady is a drag racing champion.
Two villians gain super powers have they receive some vitamins from the Pink Panther.
The Pink Panther switches the blueprints with the man's idea for his own with his idea of what the house should look like.
A conductor continues to disturb the Pink Panther while he is playing the theme song at a concert.
While a man is trying to take pictures of the scenery, the Pink Panther continually pesters him.
Pink Panther must get rid of some loud mice in his house that keep disturbing him.
The Pink Panther searches for the master of the bottle that he became genie for.
The Pink Panther wants to be a super hero, so he tries to help an old lady.
The Pink Panther is annoyed by the Big Nose Man and his dog while trying to sleep.
The Pink Panther gets stuck in a mountain cabin. He later finds out there is a mouse in there with him trying to eat all his food so he tries to hide it away from the mouse.

The Pink Panther is looking for somewhere to stay since there is a storm. He finds some but it is a haunted town. While trying to sleep he is attacked by a ghost and skeleton. He is making so much racket trying to stay away from them that the head officer of the town takes him in.
A feud between the Big Nose Man and the Pink Panther ensues after they want different color flowers for a garden.
The Pink Panther stumbles upon the town of Litterburg and cleans it up.
The Pink Panther is attacked by his shadow after he goes to the gymasium.
Pink Panther decides to to become an army man

The Pink Panther arrives on a small tropical island, but the little pointy-nosed man and his dog are also there hunting for food. When the panther hears rifle shots, he fears he is going to be prey for hunters. He decides to keep himself hidden from sight, and starts playing pranks for the man and the dog, hoping to make the man hate his pet.
The Pink Panther has a long journey and tries to tame a horse to ride home, but it may not be easy.
The Pink Panther steals a family's baby basket instead of a picnic basket at the park and ends up having to take care of the baby until the parents return.
Pink Panther becomes a building worker. He continues to destroy everything because he has no experience what so ever. He must fix everything before he is caught.
The Pink Panther goes into a magician's home and sees some strange things.
The Pink Panther appears in mini-series.
A big nosed man is nearly hurt after Pink Panther uses a kite.
A giant nosed man makes Pink Panther his servant after he got a nail out of his hand.
Crazy things happen when the Pink Panther walks into the book shop.

The Pink Panther goes to the beach and sees this big strong guy impressing the women, so the Pink Panther uses some blown up muscle to draw the attention of the ladies to him. The man becomes infuriated and tries to retain his spot as big muscle guy.
The Pink Panther tries riding a motorcycle.
The Pink Panther becomes a part of the army. He is taken off the force after deathly experiences.
A felone receives bad luck after the Pink Panther gives him a horseshoe.
The Pink Panther is stuck chasing his coin after he lost it.
A man becomes annoyed after the Pink Panther sets his home in front of his telescope.
The Pink Panther goes to the queen of the castle on his horse.
A very cranky patient sits in the room next to the Pink Panther in the hospital.
The Pink Panther and the caveman try to push a rock but they continue to fail because it is square.
A robber makes Pink Panther help him steal something.
The Pink Panther battles a cowboy while in Texas.
The Pink Panther wishes he could rollerblade.
Pink Panther tries to find some gold. He is getting no where though because of his slow camel.
The Pink Panther is put out of his hopes after receiving a job as a lumberjack. The cause: another lumberjack.
The Pink Panther must get pass a vicious dog to deliver a package.
The Pink Panther becomes the hero and and tries to do something about the sheriff's income taxing.
The Pink Panther gives the girl her needs after a witches wand accidently lands on him.
Some bugs try to eat up his house, he must stop them before he is homeless.
The Pink Panther has no clue how to go across the street without getting himself injured.
The hunter returns after the Pink Panther looks for shelter in the log cabin.
The Pink Panther orders a cuckoo-clock because he keeps missing work.
The Pink Panther operates a farm and battles two crows trying to eat his corn.
The Pink Panther fights over a bone with a caveman version of the little man and a coelophysis and a gorgosaurus until it's eaten by a Deinosuchus.
A fruit fly attacks the Pink Panther's apples, and he decides to get revenge.
The Pink Panther gets a job working in a busy cafÃ© beside a building site, and has trouble serving food to the construction workers.
A tuba-instrumenter interrupts Pink Panther while he is trying to get some relaxation.
The Pink Panther abandons a seal who is in danger.
The Pink Panther is itching like crazy because of a flea.
The Pink Panther loses his extra tire while fixing a flat.
The Pink Panther gets a job as a Chinese waiter.
The Pink Panther thinks about what his past was like.
The Pink Panther tries to find a basketball that thinks for itself.
The Pink Panther sneaks on to a ship and has to make sure he isn't caught.
The Pink Panther must hide from some poachers that want his fur.
Pink Panther changes the smile of the ""Mona Lisa.""
The Pink Panther accidently wins the ski contest with the help of the Big Nosed Man.
Pink meets a friendly fish at the beach
Pink sneaks into the Ritz Plaza Hotel for a night's sleep
The Pink Panther finds shelter in ""Transylvania"" with some scary people.
The Pink Panther takes responsibility for a zoo elephant.
The Pink Panther encounters a bear while camping.
A new born bird can't fly so Pink Panther tries to show it how.
Tarzan hunts to find Pink Panther and shave his fur off.
The Pink Panther seeks vengeance on a man who chopped down his treehouse.
The Pink Panther finds a ""street"" dog.
The Pink Panther finds a magician's hat. He sees what it can do, trouble ensues.
The Pink Panther stumbles upon magic carpets and magicians in an enchanted city.
Pink teaches a man various sports.
The Pink Panther uses his pipe to get the mice out of the town.
The Pink Panther plays an American soldier in the Revolutionary War.
Someone stole the Pink Panther's cake and he is out to find them.
A rock that the Pink Panther brought, has it's own mind.
A dog bites the Pink Panther's tail and he scurries to the hospital to get the dog off.
Pink decides to become an amateur photographer.
Pink visits an amusement arcade.
Pink is adopted by a little girl as her latest soft toy.
Staying in a motel, Pink decides to practice his trumpet playing.
Trying to have a picnic, Pink tries to lose a cloud that keeps following him.
Pink decides to lose weight.
Pink catches a tiny UFO instead of a butterfly.
Pink buys Dr Jekyll's old car.
Pink sells his cow for some beans.
The stork gets lost in a thunderstorm and delivers a baby crocodile to Pink.
Pink attempts to get rid of a fly.
Pink buries a $5 bill, and tries to get it back after a hotel is built on top of it.
The Little Man visits a psychiatrist.
Reissue of Pinky Doodle
Dailey Blabbermouth reporter Pink tries to get past the security man and guard dog at Howard Huge's mansion.
Reissue of Rocky Pink
Reissue of The Pink of Arabee
Pink goes on a South Sea cruise but finds out the captain is a pirate.
As Tarzan, Pink encounters an ape in the jungle.
Pink's tail encounters Speedy-grow fertilizer.
A cat keeps Pink awake
Pink operates a gas station for space ships.
Pink tries to make breakfast.
Pink is persuaded to become a toreador again.
Pink saves a clockwork duck from being run over.
Pink follows a piece of string.
Pink becomes a lumberjack again.
Pink uses a big magnet to find a lost coin.

The Pink Panther wants to mow his lawn, but his mower needs a new spark plug. However, the new plug falls from his hands, and it's found by a vicious watchdog who thinks it's a bone. The panther tries to get the plug back first by trying stilt walking, a balloon kit and a rope to walk on, then by digging himself under the garden and finally posing as a bone inspector.
Hospital janitor Pink takes up first aid, to the disgust of the duty doctor.
Pink goes to the Laundrette.
Pink Panther is out of groceries and goes to the supermarket.
